description: Triangle of q-binomial coefficients for q=-12.
comments: May be read as a symmetric triangular (T[n,k]=T[n,n-k]; k=0,...,n; n=0,1,...) or square array (A[n,r]=A[r,n]=T[n+r,r], read by antidiagonals). The diagonals of the former, or rows/columns of the latter, are, for k=0,...,12: A000012, A014994, A015264, A015281, A015302, A015319, A015336, A015354, A015369, A015384, A015401, A015421, A015436. - _M. F. Hasler_, Nov 04 2012
links: Index entries related to Gaussian binomial coefficients.
prog: (PARI) T015125(n, k, q=-12)=prod(i=1, k, (q^(1+n-i)-1)/(q^i-1)) \\ (Indexing is that of the triangular array: 0 <= k <= n = 0,1,2,...) - _M. F. Hasler_, Nov 04 2012
